text: "Know Your Rights" is a 1982 song by British punk rock band The Clash and is the leading single from their fifth studio album Combat Rock. It went to number 43 in the United Kingdom. It has covered by Pearl Jam live in concert in 2003. ==Track listing== ;7" vinyl # "Know Your Rights" (Joe Strummer/Mick Jones) – 3:35 # "First Night Back in London" (The Clash) – 3:00 ==References== Category:1982 songs Category:The Clash songs Category:Pearl Jam songs Category:Rockabilly songs
title: Know Your Rights
